attributes.action: Stop premier league games being played abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Premier League has announced plans to extend the season to 39 games with 1 game being played in Australia, USA or Asia. This will alienate the real fans and will also be unfair with some teams getting 1 extra easier fixture. This is a petition for fans wanting to stop this happening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
